The system should embed 30 IR LEDs

The system should embed a high
The system should protect persons and
is preceeded by a request notification
If the camera has been configured,
The QR code is the serial number of the camera.
During configuration, the serial read by the smartphone
is compared with the internal serial number.
If equal, then the communication is configured
The camera provide a valid frame
The light sensor provide a valid data
